title: Reports | Academic Computing and Communications Center | University of Illinois at Chicago

Academic Computing and Communications Center     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Academic Computing and Communications Center      Academic Computing and Communications Center   Main Menu    Services           Communication and Collaboration    Computing Services    Infrastructure    Professional Services    Research    Security    Teaching and Learning         Support           Academic Continuity    Academic Multimedia Lab and Lightboard Studio    ARC Helpdesk    C-Stop BSB    C-Stop LHS    Daley Library Helpdesk    LTS Support Office         Service Status           Service Notices         News           All News         Forms    About           Identity    Leadership    Policies    Reports    Jobs          Eyebrow menu    WebStore    Online Training    Answers    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Academic Computing and Communications Center    About    Reports        Reports       Service Utilization    ACCC provides a wide variety of services to the university to enable collaboration that helps UIC achieve its mission.  ACCC services have become the reliable and scalable core to carry forward our mission when we cannot gather on-campus and in our classrooms. The dashboards below illustrate the large increase in demand for ACCC services during the end of the spring term.       Usage Reports           Blackboard Collaborate  This dashboard shows the Blackboard Collaborate Usage trend and is updated weekly.             Blackboard Learn  This dashboard shows Blackboard Learn usage by course. This report is refreshed daily at 7am.             Google Meet  This dashboard shows the Google Hangouts Meet Usage since 02/09/2020 and is updated weekly.             Microsoft Teams  This dashboard examines the usage trends of Microsoft Teams as a Collaboration tool and is updated weekly.             Webex  This dashboard shows the usage trend of Cisco WebEx Meetings since 02/09/2020 and is updated weekly.             Zoom  This dashboard shows the usage trend of Zoom Video Conferencing since 03/01/2020 and is updated weekly.           Surveys   ACCC conducts comprehensive surveys to better understand the IT-related experiences and needs of UIC instructors, students and staff as they pertain to IT services, tools, and resources. ACCC analyzes survey-derived data to produce and publish IT survey results reports and share insights with the UIC community.      Surveys           2019 Student Survey  From September 18th to September 29th 2019, ACCC conducted a comprehensive 12-question survey.             2018 Student Survey  From September 20th to October 1st 2018, ACCC conducted a comprehensive 10-question survey.             2018 Faculty/Staff Survey  This year’s report illustrates information gathered from responses of 1,574 UIC employees (1,212 Staff and 362 Faculty).
